title: Have you captured any evidence supporting the existence of a secret 'extraterrestrial alien base' anywhere in the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. But I don't look for them because of severe eye damage. Its difficult enough for me to see spelling/grammar mistakes so I generally don't comment on photos or videos
No. I’m still making thought screen helmets and sending them to abductees but I have not obtained convincing evidence.
